messages.title: Britain needs change.
messages.content: Gordon Brown’s Labour Government has failed us. Britain needs change. But in many parts of our country, there are no Labour MPs to vote out. Labour are in a poor and distant third place. The choice is between Liberal Democrats or Conservatives.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will clean up politics - so that politicians work for you. We will cut waste so we can protect frontline public services. We’ll put money back in your pocket with our fairer tax plan.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Gordon Brown, David Cameron, Lord Ashcroft
mentions.tacticalSituation: But in many parts of our country, there are no Labour MPs to vote out. Labour are in a poor and distant third place. The choice is between Liberal Democrats or Conservatives.

issues.economy: People who are angry at whatever has happened to their local services and fear for their jobs.
issues.governance: We will clean up politics - so that politicians work for you.

leaflet.personalStatement: Together we can change Britain for the better.

images.caption: Nick Clegg engaging with various people, including addressing children, talking with an elderly person, and speaking to an individual.
